[[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/90.208.88.197|90.208.88.197]] ([[User talk:90.208.88.197|talk]]) to last version by Pranavkm
Removed potential vandalism and added citation
/* Noted current and former members and associates of Nation of Islam */
/* Antisemitism */ Use {{sic}} to indicate that Farrakhan's excessively redundant wording is really his own, not our doing. Don't need to give Wanniski's full name twice in same section.
/* Antisemitism */ Never used {{Cquote}} in articles (see it's own documetation; it's intended for project and talk pages); try {{quote}} instead. Don't link inside quotations.
/* The Mother Plane and Ezekiel's Wheel */ quotation marks
/* Antisemitism */ Don't use curly quotes, per [[WP:MOS]]
/* The Mother Plane and Ezekiel's Wheel */ Don't link inside quotations, per [[WP:MOS]] (unless it is crucial to reader understanding to do so, per [[WP:IAR]], but that's not the case here).

/* The Mother Plane and Ezekiel's Wheel */ Never add conversions into a quotation without using [square brackets] and better yet also including a note that the quote has been modified. Don't convert the same thing over and over again.
/* Comparison with traditional Islam */ Some minor formatting in section, and minor changes to table headings
